changeSet.author: awallace
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_WORKFLOW', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_WORKFLOW ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT NEWID(), FFFS_LOC_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, CENTRE NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, MFDO_AREA NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, TA_NAME NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, WORKFLOW_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, PLOT_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_WORKFLOW', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_WORKFLOW
